caption.title: Ranking of countries based on Caribbean vulnerability scores.
caption.p: Weighted average for (a) historical (2006–2011), (b)-(c) A2 scenario for 2030s and 2050s relative to 2001–2015 and (d)-(e) B2 scenario for 2030s and 2050s relative to 2001–2015. Demographic and socioeconomic sub-indices are held constant.
